info.title: Brave SDK API
info.description: Single entry-point API for all Brave SDK functions via a wrapper Lambda

post.summary: The imageSearch function enables image search capabilities through the Brave Search API, allowing users to find and retrieve images based on search queries.
post.description: The imageSearch function provides a powerful interface to search for images using the Brave Search API. It accepts a wide range of parameters to customize the search, including query, language, country, content filtering, and result limits. The function returns a Promise that resolves to an object containing detailed image search results and metadata.

body.description: Body of the imageSearch sls call

items.description: Configuration object containing all function parameters

freshness.description: Result freshness filter (preset values: 'pd', 'pw', 'pm', 'py', or custom string)

text_decorations.description: Include text decoration markers in results

result_filter.description: Comma-separated list of result types to include

error.description: Error message describing the bad request
Error message describing the server error

post.description: Executes the videoSearch function with provided parameters

body.description: Body of the videoSearch sls call

post.summary: The newsSearch function performs a news search using the Brave Search API.
post.description: This function allows users to search for news articles using various parameters through the Brave Search API. It provides flexibility in specifying search criteria such as query, country, language, and result filtering. The function returns a promise that resolves to a comprehensive news search response containing detailed information about each article.

body.description: Body of the newsSearch sls call

post.summary: Retrieves search suggestions using the Brave Search API.
post.description: This function provides search suggestions based on a given query, helping users find relevant search terms and entities. It accepts a search query and optional parameters for country and result count, returning a promise that resolves to an object containing the original query and an array of suggestion results.

body.description: Body of the suggestSearch sls call

items.description: An object containing the search parameters

is_entity.description: Whether the suggestion is an entity

error.description: Error message describing the issue with the request
Error message describing the internal server error
